metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3500 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in djvulibre-3.5.28 and earlier. A Stack overflow in function DJVU::DjVuDocument::get_djvu_file() via crafted djvu file may lead to application crash and other consequences.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-3500` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

djview - 3.5.28-2
djview3 - 3.5.28-2
djvulibre-bin - 3.5.28-2
djvulibre-desktop - 3.5.28-2
djvuserve - 3.5.28-2
libdjvulibre-text - 3.5.28-2
libdjvulibre21 - 3.5.28-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: djvulibre package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.28-2').
